channel.title: Album title suggestions?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I’m going to start working on a proper album soon. And I was wondering if you guys could help with a name suggestions? ![image|500x500](upload://KA7qrYRv2cMfeSSzBRqBBpPXTh.jpeg) (Artwork not complete)
Theme: Sounds that are so good they break walls
[own suggestions] Corruption? Smash? Bass head?

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
Boombox maybe

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
Well I’ll need to check these out. Maybe that’s why a lot of people have more Soundcloud followers than me. I only got 186. But youtube is going much better. On average 5 subscribers everyday… that’s pretty nuts

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
A distributor of some kind will make it very painless. A lot of people here (myself included) use amuse. It’s straight forward enough. I haven’t been promoting anything and I’ve kicked up a few plays, my reason for distribution is totally selfish though (really just wanted my releases in stores).

They deliver everywhere, even places I never thought of/cared about (Spotify, YouTube, iTunes, Play store etc etc)

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
I have positive ambitions and I’m sure they will come true. Step by step I’ll be getting bigger and bigger. So maybe Spotify is the next big step?

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
DJ_La_Rocca:

I’ll definatly consider starting a Spotify then. Or maybe a stripeify. Jk

Just don’t do a Streamify.

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
Better late than never. And I actually didn’t know that lol. Thanks for all the feedback and help. I’ll definatly consider starting a Spotify then. Or maybe a stripeify. Jk

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
I’m honestly surprised that anyone making (or even listening to) music for even a few months didn’t realise that Spotify is the big dog when it comes to streaming services.

Time for you to do some catching up on the industry.

Besides my music isnt professional enough to be Spotify worthy

That’s a different challenge, one we’ve all struggled with, I’d guess.

Worth checking out that thread I linked. It might help you digest how you feel about your music and how ‘ready’ it is – and how ready you are.

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
Then I’ll start one

I just didn’t know it was that serious lol.

Besides my music isnt professional enough to be Spotify worthy.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
DJ_La_Rocca:

It’s not a hobby it’s my proffesion.

Not unless you’re serious about Spotify it isn’t.

item.description:
I’ll consider starting a Spotify. But idk when

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Tbh, I’m surprised you’ve missed all the discussions about music distribution.

Still, lots of good options for you to check out.

The thread I posted previously would be a good place to start.

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
I didn’t know it was number 1 lol. I don’t know how to post on there. I looked for it but gave up.

It’s not a hobby it’s my proffesion.

And because aesthetics also prove quality. It’s eye grabbing, which means it should have a good sound

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
DJ_La_Rocca:

Because I can’t stand Spotify. I don’t like the way it works lol

So, as a music releasing artist, you’re going to let your personal preferences turn you against releasing on the #1 music platform?

I guess it’s just a hobby then. That’s fine.
but then why worry about what looks ‘professional’?

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
I don’t know how to post, and the playlist feature doesn’t work to my standards. And I can’t skip sons or pick someonthing specifically. Really irritates me

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
DJ_La_Rocca:

Yes, but I’m only on Soundcloud and youtube

SoundCloud

YouTube

+

Why aren't you on Spotify, etc…? Branding & Distribution
I, like many here, have not put my stuff up on Spotify, iTunes, etc… (yet). I hint at my reasons here, but I’m wondering… Why aren’t you on Spotify, etc…?   (For those who are, what was behind your decision to push ahead?)

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
DJ_La_Rocca:

I’m still not understanding why the listeners would find it disinteresting by the year though

EDM has a shelf life of months, sometimes weeks…

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
If this is a serious release, I’d consider getting a designer to put it together for you. (even if it’s just somebody from fiverr)

First impressions count, and I’m not sure if the current artwork would be enough to persuade me to look any further…

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
Should I just have Shatter, my logo in the corner and the “date” as an option? I tend on keeping the date tho

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
You are right with the logo. I should perhaps change that soon. I’ve been trying to draw this design for about a month but it’s nkt ready yet. I see what you mean with the “double name” but in my eyes it looks okay. For example deadmau5 4 x 4 = 12. His background is his logo and it also says deadmau5 on it. But his logo is actually a logo instead of a profile pic lol.

I’m still not understanding why the listeners would find it disinteresting by the year though

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
The blue is very hard to read on the speaker. I do like the overall design though. I’m unsure about the date too, but YMMV… if you have your logo on there too you probably just need the album/EP name

Read full topic

item.title: Album title suggestions?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
DJ_La_Rocca:

Why would that be a bad thing if the year is depicted?

The down-side might be that it fixes the release in a certain year in the mind of listeners – so they might not want to check it out a year later, etc… That’s highly likely – and almost certainly why professional musicians don’t typically put the date on the artwork of their releases.

 
Fwiw, it’s very unusual to put the artist’s name on the cover twice.
(Your logo contains your artist name. Your logo isn’t a typical logo. It looks more like a profile pic.)

 

Also the middle would look empty otherwise

I disagree. It would allow people to see the image more clearly, and make it more recognisable at smaller sizes or when glimpsed (e.g. in a list of releases).

 

And if I were big known then yeah, it’d show the date and stuff in google but I’m not that big yet for it to be recognised yearly

Every channel will list the release year – Spotify, Apple Music, Google Play, Tidal, …

Read full topic
